attributes.action: Enable a confirmation vote on  United Kingdom leaving or remaining with the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
1.There is no concensus in the commons as to how to proceed. 2. Many of those affected by the 2016 referendum were too young to vote but now are of voting age and should have a say in their future.
3. Comments presented as facts in 2016 and been proven to be incorrect.

The known facts and risks should be presented to the British Public with voting options offered.
Examples
1. Accept Parliament exit deal A
2. Accept Parliament exit deal B
3. No deal.
4. Remain in the EU on current terms.
attributes.background:
We call upon the government of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland (UK) to enable a confirmation vote on leaving or remaining in the European Union (EU).
The benefits / risks are better known. We should have the chance to re confirm our wishes.
Democracies can change their minds "David Davis".
